Rear Window

Professional photographer Jeff is stuck in his apartment, recuperating from a broken leg. Out of boredom, he begins to spy on his neighbours and comes across a shocking revelation.

Release date: August 4, 1954 (New York)

Director: Alfred Hitchcock

Cast : James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey.

Language: English

Rating IMDB: 8.5/10

Skazani na Shawshank

Andy Dufresne, a successful banker, is arrested for the murders of his wife and her lover, and is sentenced to life imprisonment at the Shawshank prison. He becomes the most unconventional prisoner.

Release date: September 22, 1994 (Beverly Hills)

Director: Frank Darabont

Cast : Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton.

Language: English

Rating IMDB: 9.3/10

Terminal

Viktor Navorski gets stranded at an airport when a war rages in his country. He is forced by the officials to stay at the airport until his original identity is confirmed.

Release date: June 18, 2004 (USA)

Director: Steven Spielberg

Cast : Tom Hanks, Catherine Zeta-Jones, and Stanley Tucci.

Language: English, Spanish, Russian, French, German.

Rating IMDB: 7.4/10
